review: The MAEXUS Switch OLED Screen Protector is a solid choice for protecting your Nintendo Switch OLED. The 99.9% transparency ensures that the screen remains clear and vibrant, and the anti-fingerprint coating is effective. The screen protector fits well, and the included tools and instructions make the installation process straightforward. However, I did notice that the wet wipes were dry, which required me to use my own cleaning solution. Despite this minor inconvenience, the quality and value of the product are commendable.
